item.title: @elonmusk: ğŸš¨ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª AFD SURGES TO 26% IN GERMAN POLLS AS MIGRANT RAPE STATS SPARK OUTRAGE Germany's AfD party just r...
item.description: ğŸš¨ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª AFD SURGES TO 26% IN GERMAN POLLS AS MIGRANT RAPE STATS SPARK OUTRAGE Germany's AfD party just rocketed to 26% in the latest polls, making it the country's top political force for the first time ever. Experts point to the ruling coalition's endless squabbles under Chancellor Merz as a big driver, plus AfD ramping up its bold talk and internal shakeups. At the same time, fresh BKA crime data is blowing up: Islamic migrants from Afghanistan and Africa are linked to gang rape suspects at rates way higher than locals, Afghans at 41 per million residents, Africans at 23, other foreigners at 3, versus just 0.6 for Germans. That's up to 70x the rate, and folks are asking why Germany keeps rolling out the welcome mat despite the risks. The migrant crisis, loaded with crime concerns like these gang rape disparities, is straight-up mobilizing voters toward AfD. Frustrated Germans see the government fumbling immigration, and AfD's tough stance on borders and security is pulling in support from all sides, turning public anger into poll gains. Source: Anadolu Agency,@amuse, BKA

item.title: @elonmusk: Elon Musk: SpaceX is building GigaBay to produce 1,000 Starships per year At GigaBay, SpaceX is mass...
item.description: Elon Musk: SpaceX is building GigaBay to produce 1,000 Starships per year At GigaBay, SpaceX is massively expanding production and integration to reach an annual output of 1,000 Starships The structure itself is enormous, by some measures, it will be the largest building on Earth Itâ€™s designed specifically for rapid Starship assembly at unprecedented scale SpaceX is building two GigaBays, one in Texas and another in Florida, bringing Starship production to the Space Coast When you see a human next to these buildings, the scale becomes obvious Itâ€™s hard to grasp how massive they are until you do This is industrial capacity built for one purpose: making life multi-planetary....ğŸš€

item.title: @elonmusk: The radical left has been using fraudulent government programs for a long time to import and retain ...
item.description: The radical left has been using fraudulent government programs for a long time to import and retain vast numbers of illegal (and legal, in some cases) immigrants to win elections and turn America into a single-party state, destroying any real democracy. The more you look at it, the more you will be horrified at what your tax money is doing and the fact that, if this is not reversed, your vote will mean nothing. The most obvious case example is the Somali voting bloc in Minnesota, a state that historically had zero Somalis, electing Ilhan Omar to the US Congress. The same is happening in Europe, UK, Canada, Australia and New Zealand.
